_sText:
By:

shini
______________________________

This map is based in a factory-type setting.The map is not too long but it is a little difficult when you get to the end. There are about 11 or so traps, and a couple of new ideas. This map stays true to its name 'illusions' where, at the end of the map, there is an illusion maze that the opposing team will have to navigate though. Then comes the tricky part. The trappers will get to choose the course of the maze. Here, is a choice of three buttons which all create a separate path route for the other team to take a chance and cross.

_______________________________
Thanks goes out to:
